LisaacTM Platform

UNIT_TEST

Unit testing framework for Lisaac
Inherit/Insert Summary
parent_object No developed.
 
Slot Summary
init
Initialize unit testing. This currently looks for command line parameters and configures itself accordingly.
set_verbose
When verbose is true, suite names, section names, passed and failed tests will all be reported. When verbose is false, only failed tests will be reported.
suite
Set the major suite name
section
Set the minor section of a suite
test_failed
Fail a test with no data report
test_failed got expected
Fail a test
test_passed
Pass a test
test integer equals
Test equality between two INTEGER values, fail on not equal
test real_16_16 equals
Test equality between two REAL_16_16 values, fail on not equal
test boolean equals
Test equality between two BOOLEAN values, fail on not equal
test character equals
Test equality between two CHARACTER values, fail on not equal
test string equals
Test equality between two STRING values, fail on not equal
test_results
Print the test results to the screen. If fail_count > 0 then the program will exit with an error level of 1.
